word:
Again and again in the progress of our work, fanatical movements have arisen, and when the matter was presented before me, I have had to bear a message similar to the message I am bearing to my brethren from Indiana. I have been instructed by the Lord that this movement in Indiana is of the same character as have been the movements in 
                                                                           34
years past. In your religious meetings there have been exercises similar to those I have witnessed in connection with those movements in the past.
